articles.title: The Real Problem with Jon Jones vs Alex Pereira
articles.description: In this video, Chael Sonnen breaks down the real challenges behind a potential Jon Jones vs Alex Pereira matchup. While fans want the fight now, there are major factors keeping it from happening, including UFC scheduling, fighter priorities, and the complexities of title implications. Chael explains why Jon Jones is unique in his willingness to wait for fights, how UFC matchmaking works, and how Alex Pereira‚Äôs current injury affects timing. From ‚Äúone-and-done‚Äù concerns to planning meaningful fights with long-term significance, Chael gives the inside perspective on what‚Äôs really holding up one of the most anticipated matchups in MMA. If you‚Äôre a fan of UFC fight strategy, fighter scheduling, and Jon Jones‚Äô legacy, this is a must-watch breakdown. #JonJones #AlexPereira #UFC #MMA #FightAnalysis #UFCWhiteHouse #LightHeavyweight #MMAInsights Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. UFC Champions, Jon Jones, Conor McGregor, Colby Covington, Khamzat Chimaev, the MMA hour and commentary on the latest UFC news, UFC Champions in 2022, UFC knockouts and finishes.

articles.title: Islam Makhachev Opens Up About UFC 322 Weight Struggles
articles.description: In this video, Chael Sonnen breaks down Islam Makhachev‚Äôs weight struggles ahead of UFC 322. Islam reveals his challenge of walking around at 192 lbs, cutting down to 182 lbs on fight week, and adding back 12 lbs just before stepping into the Octagon. Chael explains why gaining weight as a professional fighter can be harder than it seems, especially when training with bigger partners and maintaining peak performance. We also dive into how Islam‚Äôs focus on both 155 lbs and 170 lbs creates a unique challenge for his career path, his mindset for fighting top contenders, and how his training adjustments could impact potential matchups‚Äîincluding his fight with Jack. If you‚Äôre a fan of UFC weight strategy, fighter insights, and Islam Makhachev‚Äôs road to success, this video gives an inside look at the physical and mental challenges elite fighters face. #IslamMakhachev #UFC322 #WeightCut #MMA #FightWeek #UFC #ChaelSonnen #MMAInsights #FighterMindset Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. articles.description: "Overreaction Time" (Tuesdays, noon ET) is a weekly podcast hosted by MMA Junkie managing editor Simon Samano where he shares his "overreactions" with an MMA Junkie staff member, and the debate begins! On this edition, he and MMA Junkie senior reporter Mike Bohn discuss the following: (00:00) - Intro (01:12) - Ciryl Gane‚Äôs eye poke probably saved Tom Aspinall from defeat? (06:12) - Everyone blaming Tom Aspinall for ‚Äútaking the easy way out‚Äù can f*ck right off. (18:12) - Mackenzie Dern won‚Äôt make it through 2026 as UFC strawweight champion. (24:20) - Umar Nurmagomedov won‚Äôt be UFC bantamweight champion as long as Merab is around. (24:20) - Quillan Salkilld delivered the SCARIEST knockout of 2025. (27:55) - Ilia Topuria vs. Paddy Pimblett is the fight to make, and it should headline the UFC‚Äôs first numbered event on Paramount+. articles.title: Aspinall HOT TAKE! + Jones vs. Pereira = Biggest HW fight of ALL TIME? | Good Guy / Bad Guy
articles.description: On this episode of Good Guy / Bad Guy‚Ä¶The Bad Guy is doubling down on his now viral comments that Tom Aspinall should have continued fighting after being poked in the eyes by Cyril Gane. But does DC agree with the hot take that ruffled feathers across the MMA community? Then, there‚Äôs a new Women‚Äôs Strawweight Champion of the world and her name is Mackenzie Dern! DC breaks down his heartfelt moment with Dern and her daughter that gave fight fans all the feels. Plus, is she making the right move calling for the likes of Tatiana Suarez or Zhang Weili as her next opponent? And, Jon Jones says he‚Äôs down to fight Alex Pereira at the White House. Find out if the guys believe this could be the biggest Heavyweight title fight in UFC history. articles.title: Gane Gets Another Shot ‚Äî Is Aspinall Still the Heavy Favorite?
articles.description: Start fresh at https://tryfum.com/products/zero-crisp-mint. Over 500,000 people have already made the switch ‚Äî no nicotine, no vapor, no batteries. Just flavor, fidget, and a fresh start. UFC 321's main event ended in controversy as Tom Aspinall's first title defense against Ciryl Gane was halted due to an accidental eye poke. Despite the no-contest outcome, the question remains: Is Aspinall still the favorite in a potential rematch? In this video, Chael Analyzes the fight's dynamics, examining Aspinall's striking power and Gane's defensive skills. We also discuss the psychological impact on both fighters and speculate on how the betting odds might shift for a future bout. Join us as we break down the key moments and what they mean for the heavyweight division. articles.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane LIVE Watch-Along |  Sat. @ 2 p.m. ET/ 11 a.m. PT
articles.description: Join MMA Junkie Radio hosts "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" at 2 p.m. ET/ 11 a.m. PT for a live-streamed watch-along of UFC 321 in Abu Dhabi. The card is headlined by Tom Aspinall and Ciryl Gane battling for the heavyweight title. The co-main event is a battle for the vacant women's strawweight title between Virna Jandiroba and Mackenzie Dern. articles.title: Daniel Cormier REACTS to Tom Aspinall vs. Ciryl Gane CONTROVERSIAL NO CONTEST, eye poke ends fight
articles.description: Daniel Cormier IS BACK live from Abu Dhabi UFC 321 to give his post-fight reaction to Tom Aspinall vs. Ciryl Gane being ruled a NO CONTEST after an eye poke to Tom! DC weight in on the controversial end to the fight, and what that means for Gane and Aspinall moving forward. Plus, Cormier gives his take on Mackenzie Dern's title fight win in the co-main event. articles.title: Ciryl Gane on people SLEEPING ON HIM vs. Tom Aspinall, BAD loss to Jones | Daniel Cormier Check-In
articles.description: Ciryl Gane IS BACK on another episode of the Daniel Cormier Check-In series ahead of the TOUGHEST FIGHT of his career against UFC heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall. DC and Ciryl break down the Jon Jones first-round submission loss, and what went wrong for him that night. Cormier and Gane also compare Tom to his past opponents, and Ciryl explains why fighting guys like Francis Ngannou and Derrick Lewis will make the fight WAY TOUGHER for Aspinall. And don't miss the guys talk shoe sizes, his strategy on Saturday night in the main event of UFC 321 in Abu Dhabi, and so much more!
